content.detailedDescription:
1. where were you and what were you doing at the time?
i was driving north on state route 20/highway 97 about 10-15 minutes outside of tonasket, washington at approx 3-4 am.

2. what made you first notice the object?
i saw a streak of light in the sky, at first i thought it was a shooting star so i watched it.


3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?
shooting star

4. describe the object and its actions and motions in detail.
it was flying very fast towards earth at probably a 20-30 degree angle and before it hit earth it stopped instantly and reversed its direction getting back up to its original speed in an instant. 


5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.
my passenger and i talked about what we just saw, how i didn't think that was physically possible, theres no way someone could have been inside because of the g-forces pulled?, etc, etc. we stopped at the gas station in tonasket and told the attendant, both of us white as ghosts.


6. how did you lose sight of the object?
i don't really remember this part as it has been 12 years since i saw it, i think it just flew out of sight.
content.summary: Bright light changed directions instantly and flew back opposite direction

content.detailedDescription: I was walking on 7/11/2013 around the soccer field at the university of cincinnati, gettler stadium, at 3:54am when due west, the direction i was walking at the time, a light appeared in the sky at 40 degrees up.  the object was moving quickly at the size of star-like and quickly brightened to extremely bright, 10 to 100 times brighter than anything in the sky and to the size of an aspirin in the shape of a teardrop.  so bright i felt like i was having a beam of light pointed at me.  then it dimmed all the way back down to star-like.  at first, it looked like it was moving east, south east, towards me and across my view toward the south.  however, after it dimmed, it appeared to just be moving south, south west.  a loud boom or bang bounced off the ground near the campus toward the direction of the object.  it is possible the noise was unrelated to the object, possibly a trash truck dumping a dumpster.  after dimming, i followed the object across the sky with my unaided eye for about 20 seconds until i could no longer see the object due to distance and clouds.  8 minutes later, at 4:03am, in the same area of the sky and moving in the same direction i saw what appeared to be the same object moving the near exact path across the sky.  i didn't see any brightening of the object this time.  it too, about 10-15 seconds later disappeared due to distance and clouds.  i was at the stadium from 3am til almost 5am and saw no other objects like it, nor heard any other loud booms.  i thought it was a meteor skipping off the atmosphere, but once i saw it again, it seemed too much of a coincidence.  the object appeared to be extremely far away.  possibly flying over between west side of cincinnati and indiana border.
content.summary: Brightened 10x to 100x then dimmed back to star-like.  saw again 8 min later just star-like, same path

content.detailedDescription:
I live east of fort vancouver, i cannot see the fireworks at the fort from my place but can hear them. i can see the columbia river. i see planes every day and night across the water at the portland air port. anyway it was abot 1100pm give or take and i was looking towards the fort to see if i could see the fireworks. i then noticed the big dipper . then what caugt my eye was this light. it flew towards the bottom right corner star then just disappeared like it left our space  then another then another then another. one more then nothing. i thought they must have watched the fireworks and are headed home. really that was my thought. end of story. 

i reported one that i had seen in the seventies in willams calif. these are the only unexplained things i  have seen. these are both true and clearly no one will ever tell me different  ever
content.summary: 4-5 yellow orange lights flying at the bottom tip of the big dipper . one after another flew and dissapeared

content.detailedDescription: This is in reference to any earlier sighting of a craft seen during 4th of july fireworks in chickasha. i was watching them from a street near the park where the were being fired. my wife and i saw a yellow orange light flying large circle around the area. i did not see any blinking lights or hear any sound from it though the fireworks were booming. it made several passes and left. i assumed it was a copter or plane watching the light show. who knows.
content.summary: Fourth of july craft

content.detailedDescription:
At 10:50pm 7-9-13 i stepped into my back lot to let my dog out. as i
was waiting i looked up to the sky and saw a larger than a star very
bright orb sharped object. the direction was in the northern sky between
the bottom of the big dipper and the north star.
it wasn't moving when i observed it but then it moved in a north direction
getting smaller the farther away it traveled. also one second it was there,
then it wasn't, then it was, then it was gone. the night was cloudless.
when i first saw the object i had no thoughts on what it might or might
not be, the whole experience happened in a few seconds.
afterward, i collected my thoughts i remembered seeing the same thing a
few nights ago. the same area in the northern sky and the same looking
object doing the same movements.
content.summary: White larger than a star orb in north sky, bright in color

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was at home in my house, and talking on the phone. however this event didn't cause any interference for me.

2. what made me notice the object was that it appeared be be extremely bright outside in my back yard, so i went to investigate.

3. when i first saw it i thought it was just a full moon and didn't pay much attention to it, then i realize the moon was in a different location. 

4. the object was spherical in shape, and stationary. extremely bright and almost seemed to have a slight pulse as it lit up everything. i could see clearly as if it was was mid day. 

5. when i thought it was a ufo, i didn't think much about it. however i kept watching to see if it would do anything else. i didn't feel scared or threaten, if anything i was more curious. after the object left i was a little disappointed that it didn't do much then it did. 

6. the object flashed then took off into the sky in a arc shape and was gone from sight. i will note that as it was leaving i had a idea of the distance it was from me do the the fact of the object changing size when it departed. however i could be wrong. meaning it was either extremely large in shape and far away.... or small and closer then i realized. the only reference i have is that i had mistaken it for the moon because it was so big. i thought it was the moon and roughly the same shape.
content.summary: Bright orb, was located high in the night sky it looked like the moon but brighter, then dissapeared

content.detailedDescription: I am a sky watcher all my life (love astronomy) and very scientific minded so i am not easily tricked. anyways, i was walking my dogs around the block at dusk. i was headed south with the moon and venus to my right. straight ahead (south) i observed a white light slowly moving nw that i figured to be an airplane. as i neared the end of the street (actually just where the street turns a corner) i saw a faint white halo form around the object. after 2-4 seconds with the halo it suddenly brightened up for a second or less and then disappeared into itself. best way i can describe is like when you turn off an old tv. the light just shrunk down to nothing vs just suddenly disappearing. i continued my walk, a bit nervous, but i kept watching for it to make a return but that was the end of it.
content.summary: White orb moving slow thought was plane but faint white halo formed around it, then brightened then disappeared into itself

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside at about 2:30am to have a ciggarette because my cat woke me up. about a minute into my smoke i observed two red lights glowing in the distance comming from the south headed north. as soon as they got closer they started making a criscross pattern in the sky like they were in formation. i heard no sounds of anykind even crickets went silent. ive always wondered if anyone had ever reported the same thing? i have also seen other objects in the past and will fill out more reports. thanks for your time and the hard work you do!

sincerly, joshua jorgensen
content.summary: Two red lights criscrossing in the sky above me

content.detailedDescription: No other aircraft observed in the area, first 2 pair of red orbs moving very fast from se to nw, 2 more pairs one significantly behind the others heading same direction, then 1 single same speed same direction then 2 more pairs to follow, last single almost over the house. no flashing lights, dull red to dull orange orbs, lasted maybe 10 minutes, got a brief clip of 1 with cell phone camera. if they were aircraft, they were not ours.
content.summary: Observed at least 8 dull red orbs two pairs good separation, then consecutive pairs not following the same path but the same direction

content.detailedDescription:
I went out my front door to have a cigarette, my daughter came out with me. as we sat on the steps, i noticed a bright yellowish light on a hilltop to the southeast. it looked to me like the whole top of the hill was on fire but my daughter said it was a plane because we could hear one. it cleared the hill and when it did i could see it was huge-full moon sized. it got smaller as it came closer to us though. 
as it came closer the jet sound faded. the sound had actually been a plane far to the west.
it stayed below the cloud cover and as it got closer we could see the lights. it looked like an egyptian eye. it also had 3 lights above or on top of it. they were thin long lights. one was vertical and centered on top of it, the other two were on either side of the center one and one slopex to right one to left. it looked like a crown on top.
only the lights could be seen, i have no idea if the lights followed the outline of the object or not.
it flew silently from southeast to north below the clouds and pazsed over my house. we stepped out into the yard so we could keep it in sight as it passed over our house. when it was over our back yard it simply winked out, but the light seemed to waver or shimmer first.
the objects speed was about the same as an airplane.
feelings? mainly disbelief. i have spent most eveni.Gs stargazing for the past 40 years and this is the only time i have been absolutely certain as i was seeing it that it was not a satellite or conventional aircraft. hope you guys can tell me wjat it was.
content.summary: Egyptian eye shaped object flew from southeast to north then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: It was a day like anyother day,iwas seating out side looking up at the sky like i do,it was so clear no clouds.So i am looking at a what i belive it to be a b52 flying across the sky.I was face west so i think i was faceing tampa fl.Any way as i looking at this plane i always wonder what it is that they release from their engines someone told me once the it is call a jet stream.So i will go with that.Anyway as i am staring at the stream i notice that at the end of jet stream there was a hot pink light following the jet so i said to myself this very wierd ,as long as i have seen this jets fly by never did i see something like this.I was just about to run and get my camara,this object just shot striaght up and disappear.In my opinion this was and will stress it a ufo .It was awesome,and i have to say this was not my first sigthing.I have seen others,but i do keep this to myself as others do not understand.
content.summary: I was watching a i guess it was a b52 flying by as they do on everyday but this one was every unusual

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside my house having a smoke at approx 9pm on july the 8th,2013 when i happened to notice a bright object moving. at first i dismissed it as a satellite but it was moving very fast and there was no sound at all. i watched the light for about 2 min as it pulsated in a pattern starting with bright white, to yellowish orange, to a blueish green then it would fade out completely and then repeat the pattern. i watched it do this 3 times before it faded off into the distance. the whole time it kept the same se trajectory with what looked like a small deviation in direction which may have looked that way because of the weird wobble it seemed to have. after it disappeared i kept looking to see if there would be more to see, after about 4-5 min i noticed a large aircraft approaching from the west heading east and flying kinda low. i noticed that this plane was large like a commercial airliner but it was moving very fast and low. was at least 7-10 seconds before i heard this plane after seeing it.... i would assume military... maybe tracking the object i saw.I was very excited after all of this as i am constantly looking up trying to see anything of interest i know they are out there i have seen an object before back in 1989 when i was young and i was hoping i would get the opportunity to see something again.
content.summary: Saw light fade in a pattern 3 times while moving ne. pattern of bright white to yellow-orange to blue-green before fading out of sight moving fast

content.detailedDescription: I was taking my friends home at about 10:30pm after a dinner party, when i looked south over the san bernardino airport. i saw what looked like a bright blue glowing disk. i hovered about 600ft over the northern-most hangars. as i watched, it vanished. looked like it disintegrated but more like turned on invisibility. it became no longer visible. the whole event took no time at all. at least not enough time for me to get my camera.
content.summary: Glowing blue disk over airport!

content.detailedDescription: I was in the parking lot of subway watching the fireworks at around 9:40pm and looked to the ne and saw a red large star like ufo below the clouds, i saw no blinking lights and no sound. the ufo moved very slowly in a straight path, very slow unlike a plane that moved in a steady pace. the ufo changed direction disappeared as if the lights were turned off. then reappeared in the same position the continued to move slowly in its current position, then disappeared into a cloud. the ufo moved upwards into a cloud then i did not see it again. i knew that it wasn't a plane or a star, and i wasn't the only person that seen it. me and my friends did and knew that it was really weird. my friend tried to take a picture but wasn't able to, his phone stopped working. he was already taking pictures of the fireworks and didn't have a problem with his phone until he tried to take a picture of the ufo. i felt amazed to finally see one, and also curious to know if anyone else has seen one also.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Ufo was sphere shaped, red light, almost like a red star moving slowly.

content.detailedDescription:
I have seen multiple sightings, but we can see the best from my back yard after sunset, when is clear (we have a lot of fog here) but is the usual to see something weird in the sky, we live behind a small mount range that protects the san francisco sfo. and some how i think sfo. can not see them but we can, i had also witness a round disc like ufo. at the bay bridge, but when i got close enough it was gone, (weird).
my son, wife, and i were hanging out in the back yard witness flashing lights strait on top of our heads, my son and i, in an other time we witness a flying glowing orb, mush like a small flying sun, at low altitude and very slow, (jaw dropping event) at least for us it was, and the continuous flying of objects with add lights that are going at a super fast speed up so high that i think that the light that we see it is the reflection of the sum on it sun, after sun set with in an hour more or less, and that gives me the idea that they are metallic or gray in color and they can cast the light of the sun, even when is dark here because the height in which they fly, i think that's why we can see them here.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Other,Unknown
content.shape: Circle,   Disc,   Fireball,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Other,   Unknown
content.summary: We still some times see them here from my back yard.

content.detailedDescription: The first one that i saw...I was hanging out with two friends standing outside one of their houses. i first noticed the starlike object and pointed it out. it was much brighter than a star and when we all watched it, it shot off at incredible speeds and was gone. i remarked about how i had never seen one before and one of my friends said he saw them all the time. the second was when i and the friend who had seen them before, were coming home from the movies. we turned down my parents road and during a clear long straight stretch, i noticed the craft right above us. it was larger than i could tell...Maybe a football field. i can't remember if it was circular or not but it looked black against the sky that was a kind of purple at the time. what i do remember is that there were lots of lights under the craft. we slowed down and drove underneath it very slowly. i told my friend to turn around just about a fourth of a mile and when we went back to the place it was gone. i haven't told anyone but friends and family about my experience because i'm afraid of being seen as crazy. i've been having strange dreams about when i was little and staying at my grandmothers house. i'm in bed and a light comes through the window. i look outside and there is a silver craft by the tree. in my dream i feel like i should hide. i used to hate going to my grandmothers house when i was little. i would spend one night and then scream and cry for my parents to come and get me. i'm not sure if these are just dreams or if i am remembering something. i have 3 children and having these dreams really worries me for them. i'd kinda like to find out what's going on with me. there is so much more than i can put down here. please help.
content.summary: 2 ufos seen over 2 nights. one starlike on the first night. 2nd craft closer and seen from bottom.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were laying in bed at midnight watching tv when i looked out our bedroom window and saw a bright orange flame above our horse barn. i told my wife and jumped out of bed to get my glasses and we both went to  the window as i thought either my barn was on fire or an airplane was on fire. we both watched it traveling slowly westbound and, as it was going over my house and out of sight i ran and turned off the house alarm so i could open the front door and watch it. i opened the south door and went outside. both of us saw it. it was very bright orange, round, and looked as if it had flames trickling around it. it also had a perfectly round white center. it was not too far away and was about the size of a dime or penny held at arms length. it was slowly changing  direction from sw to nw and suddenly shot straight up and out of site in the clouds. the cloud layer was very low that evening so it probably was not too high up.
    i can tell you it was not an airplane, meteor, flare, balloon or anything that we had ever seen before. we're not too crazy, i'm retired army, now a high school teacher and i work part-time as a deputy sheriff and my wife is a nurse, so we're not too prone to fantasy. we can just say that this was something extremely unique and something we had never seen before. the most interesting aspect of the sighting was the fact that this thing had the appearance of flames trickling around it. there was no trail behind it of any kind, just the round, bright orange ball. when it ascended it went straight up at a very high speed into the clouds before it went out of site. when it was over our barn when we first observed it it was much larger and brighter,about the size of a quarter which made it so alarming as a fire. this makes  me believe it was gaining altitude as it was moving from east to west. i should have grabbed my phone to video it, but things happened too quickly.
content.summary: We observed a glowing orange light travel over our barn, turn slightly, then ascend straight up rapidly.

content.detailedDescription: Driving throught yosemite october 29 with my husband.  we pulled to the side of the road and i snapped a shot with my phone.  there were no other people around and i saw no bugs.  perhaps this picture is a bug but i thought i would post, maybe others have seen something like it.
content.summary: With my husband and stoped to take a piture with my phone and this showed up. not seen with the naked eye. didnt not see bugs around, maybe this is.

content.detailedDescription: In our pasture was a recently cut large box elder burl, over 500 lbs and 48 inches in diameter, growing water sprouts which would have made it difficult to burn. it was wrapped with a 4" wide car towing strap which had been used to move it with a tractor. the entire burl disappeared leaving a circular ash footprint with only a 1/2 " of ash remaining.  a perfect 4 foot section of the toe strap remained outside the circle with a burned edge. the pasture grass was very dry and remained unaffected outside the burned circle. the ground with in the circle remained sterile for several years after the incident. we work at home and were in town at the time of the disappearance but never had any indication of a fire or burning of the log (smoke or smoke odor).
content.summary: Giant green wood burl removed from our yard

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i decided to meet in fishers, in because we wanted to see each other, and this was a good half-way point.  she asked me to meet her at a "reserve" kind of place, and i got there before she did.  honestly, i began talking to spirits(of which i do), and taking pictures.  but, i had recalled someone saying, "if you want to see a ufo, just point the cameras up"..So, i did, and the very first thing i seen, was this dark sphere. i figured balloon, and thought, "i'll go ahead and get it on video if i can...So i did.  it's so far away, so i'm not sure what it is.  strange thing, and not sure if this could be connected; however, earlier i was doing evp work @ a cemetery and received a "class a" evp(anyone can make out without enhancement); which is rare.  then, i was taking photos inside of a tomb, thru a small window...With no flash...And got a very nice orb.  then, while waiting on dani, i happened to catch this object in the sky. i reviewed it on my window movie maker software to view it frame by frame; and got one shot that even shows a few different colors "possibly" i'm not trying to cry wolf here, just not sure what exactly it is.
content.summary: Sitting @ a park waiting on girlfriend.  i had my camera and took some pics; then thougt i'd take shots of the sky randomly, and the very first thing i saw, was this sphere that was dark in color, so i began to shoot video.

content.detailedDescription: Same story as before. my mother and i working at the bar, did not notice the orb until later...For the past four days i have been on lookout for the same ufo in hopes that i could capture it on camera again. this time, however, it did not last a long time in the sky and it seemed to be trying to cloak itself. the orb seemed more blue than black and it was faint. the video i took did not show anything compared to what i witnessed. after a while of checking up on it, the object hovered straight down in less than ten seconds, no drifting side to side, no struggle, just straight down. i attempted to record the descent, running past the building to get a better shot, but could not due to it being too dark. next time, if i see it, i will use my mother's phone and get as close as possible.
content.summary: Same black orb ufo witnessed four days ago, only descended straight down before sunrise. could not get good look of ufo due to bad quality camera.

content.detailedDescription: Sitting in the backyard with my wife, who also observed the 2 objects, looking up at the night sky when a very bright object lit up. the object was moving at 323 degrees nw. the object then dimmed to no light at all then re-appeared moving 0 degrees n. second object was similar in nature but moved from the 323 degrees nw to a 70 degree ne route. while writing this observation another object did the exact same thing. shined bright then dimmed to nothing then came back very bright again. moving in the nw route. approximate time 11:05 pm pst. i used my satellite app and it showed no potential objects in that direction. there was also an airplane that left san jose international airport heading approx 60 degrees ne at the same time of seeing the third object.
content.summary: 2 objects start like changed direction

content.detailedDescription:
New year's eve 2012 visiting a friend at colac victoria.  the sky was crystal clear and we were sky watching for any signs of ufo's in the distance.  we went inside to get something, came back out and directly above were three huge orange orbs glowing and hovering, it's as if they were watching us.  they seemed to be hovering about the height of where a helicopter would fly, but they definitely were not helicopters.  at first i couldn't believe what i was seeing, as there was no sound at all. they hovered above us for a few minutes then slowly glided off to the north east towards melbourne, until we lost sight of them.

while driving to colac from melbourne (3 hour drive) earlier that day i had been listening to dr. steven greer's cd's on the ce-5 protocols and i was very focussed on this all day.  i can't help but feel they actually came to me because i was so focussed on the ce-5 protocol. 

we certainly did not feel threatened at all and looking back, i wish i had tried to communicate telepathically, as this may have been what they were waiting for.  unfortunately the cameras were in the house and i didn't want to run inside in case i missed something.

i will never forget this unbelievable encounter for as long as i live and every time i think of it, it puts a smile on my face.
content.summary: Three large orange orbs hovering directly above

content.detailedDescription: I saw this object after i enlarged a photo i had taken. i took 2 photos, in the first one you can see a speck in the distance of the approach, in the 2nd photo it is quite clear when slightly enlarged. i had been taking a photo of a barge and what it was towing. i have no idea what it is and showed it to other people and no one could id what it is. i'm hoping you can help.I took these photos from my hotel balcony at 4:07pm in ormond beach fl.I wasn't aware of the object while i was shooting the picture.
content.summary: This ufo appeared in 2 photos i took

content.detailedDescription:
got in my swimming pool for a night swim and as i began floating on my back i looked up at the stars. i was startled to have a very bright light shinning directly at me. i have seen aircraft approach lights before (naval aviation 10 yrs) so i quickly dismissed the idea of it being an aircraft. the angle would be to steep. the light was almost directly above me. the light faded out and then re-appeared taking approximately 4-6 second intervals from bright to dark. i have also seen satellites in the night sky and i assumed that this is what it was. how ever i have never seen one with a light. 
     as i am writing this i am realizing that the object was not moving as fast as a satellite but close to it. i continued to try and track it and realized that as it would go dark it would appear farther to the west... still headed in a n/nw direction. each time it would go dark i would try to anticipate where it would appear and i was wrong until i figured it out. i began to use a star and a notch in my wall to be sure.  always appearing to the west of where i thought it should be. it continued in the same direction until i lost it.
     very dusty conditions here in the phoenix area at the time.
     i don't know if this was just an odd satellite or something else. i felt the need to let someone know.
content.summary: Pulsating light traveling n/nw with a lateral shift when dark.

content.detailedDescription: Same story as before. my mother and i working at the bar, did not notice the orb until later...For the past four days i have been on lookout for the same ufo in hopes that i could capture it on camera again. this time, however, it did not last a long time in the sky and it seemed to be trying to cloak itself. the orb seemed more blue than black and it was faint. the video i took did not show anything compared to what i witnessed. after a while of checking up on it, the object hovered straight down in less than ten seconds, no drifting side to side, no struggle, just straight down. i attempted to record the descent, running past the building to get a better shot, but could not due to it being too dark. next time, if i see it, i will use my mother's phone and get as close as possible.
content.summary: Same black orb ufo witnessed four days ago, only descended straight down before sunrise. could not get good look of ufo due to bad quality camera.

content.detailedDescription: I was using my downstairs bathroom and happened to notice an object out the back window. the object was only in view for about 10 seconds. what i saw was a glowing almond shaped object racing across the sky, almost as though it was skipping like a rock would across a lake.  my gut reaction was it was a light source outside, however i was able to follow it accross the horizon as it got smaller. the object was moving from south to north and was difficult to judge any sound or exact size as i was inside the house. immediately following the first object, a black triangle shaped object crossed the same path in the opposite direction moving west to east. after seeing the first object, i went outsode to see if i could explain the lights. this craft was solid black, had three defined glowing white corners and a red pulsing light directly in the center. the triangle object made a low rumble sound as i watched it from my back deck. it was moving slowly across the sky, not unlike a conventional aircraft would. however the sound, shape and light configuration were not familiar to me.
content.summary: Glowing almond shaped object, moving at incredible speed. appeared to be skipping across sky. followed by a black triangle moving in opposite direction.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking dog and looking up at sky to see the local vultures flying around...Saw one of the vultures and looked for the others..Saw a plane in distance..Followed the plane when i noticed a black object dome shaped top with square bottom..Thought it was balloon but did not have shape or travel like a balloon...Ran inside to call husband to see it and we observed it flying it a smooth path heading north, northwest over the trees until we lost sight of it..First reaction was wtf that's not a balloon.
content.summary: Black object in sky

content.detailedDescription: We had gone to our lake house on lake livingston texas, we would lay in the street, an watch the sky, looking for shooting stars, satalites, the milky way.......... it was always really dark so we could see real well, my wife noticed some lights coming from the north just above the tree line.. they covered the entire horizon from left to right, all we could make out were the lights, but they moved as one unit, no sound. we thought at ist it was  a squadron of helicopters.. we tried to wake up our neighbors but no one was home.. it was moving right to left towards our son on our dock we yelled at him but he never saw it.......We came in the house an we sat down to draw what we saw........
content.summary: My entire family witnessed this event..

content.detailedDescription: This was a few years ago so some details are a little fuzzy. it was halloween and i was trick or treating with my friends in williamsburg. we noticed a glowing orange light in the sky and stopped to watch. it was soon joined by 2 or 3 others. they then proceeded to drop this glowing orange substance, which trickled down and looked sort of like a flare. we watched them do this for a few minutes, and i'm not sure what happened afterwards. we either just walked away after a while, or they disappeared and then we walked away. i thought they might have been those lanterns that people light off on the 4th of july, but i don't know why someone would have been doing that on halloween. also the objects' behavior indicated otherwise, as they appeared out of nowhere and hovered in place.
content.summary: Glowing orange lights on halloween, dropped glowing orange substance
